title: Internal compiler error while compiling `bincode`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code The package and the project using it compiles just fine on my Arch machine, but on a laptop running PopOS, it gives the below error. I was compiling https://github.com/Vixeliz/Vinox with `cargo r -r` in the main directory. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (ab654863c 2023-03-15) binary: rustc commit-hash: ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010 commit-date: 2023-03-15 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/outlives/env.rs:145:26: add_outlives_bounds: unexpected regions ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/outlives/env.rs:145:26: add_outlives_bounds: unexpected regions thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f32c5f6750a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hca5b94e57c77ccf5 at /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f32c5f6750a -
